overview: From 2025-11-30 to 2025-12-07, ethereum-optimism/docs had 4 new PRs (6 merged), 6 new issues, and 45 active contributors.

Link to rustdocs once crate is published

topPRs.title: Update Actions SDK Config doc
topPRs.author: its-everdred
topPRs.body:
## Problem

We've updated the way `ActionsConfig` works.

## Solution

- [ ] update the `ActionsConfig` example
- [ ] bump sdk version
- [ ] regenerate actions sdk reference page components

topPRs.title: Clarify batcher throttling descriptions
topPRs.author: geoknee
topPRs.body:
Correct the labels for transaction and block size limits to reflect maximum/minimum intensity order, and remove the mention of the experimental PID controller
